Events and trends
* 1104 BCâFoundation of Cadiz, Spain.

* c. 1100 BCâMycenaean era ends with the destruction of that civilisation. The
  collapse of Mycenaean dominance starts.
* c. 1100 BCâLate Minoan culture ends.
* c. 1100 BCâGreek Dark Ages begin.
* c. 1100 BCâBeginning of the proto-Villanovan culture in northern Italy.
* c. 1100 BCâThe New Kingdom in Egypt comes to an end.
* c. 1100 BCâShang Dynasty ends in China.
* c. 1102 BCâMaya Calendar counts time from this point.

Significant people
* King David is ruler over Israel.
* c. 1100 BCâZarathustra is born.

Inventions, discoveries, introductions
* Alphabet developed by Phoenicians.
* MUL.APIN developed by Assyrians: an ancient catalog of constellations.
